Event.Message: The Windows component "%1" was successfully installed. (Command line: "%2")
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ComponentName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CommandLine" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows component "%1" was successfully uninstalled. (Command line: "%2")
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ComponentName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CommandLine" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows component "%1" could not be configured. The component installer returned an error: %2 "%3" (Command line: "%4")
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ComponentName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CommandLine" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Windows component could not be configured because of an error: %1 "%2" (Command line: "%3")
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CommandLine" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
